name: Paddy Barry's
whatToOrder: Beer. Food from the pizza glory hole.

name: The Tam
whatToOrder: PBR, Miller High Life, or Schlitz

name: Tasty Burger
whatToOrder: $10 burger and fries with a tallboy

name: Eddie C's
whatToOrder: Hot dogs. Single beers, never a pitcher. It's cheaper that way.

name: Tavern at the End of the World
State Park
whatToOrder: Gansett, Gennesee or State Park Cocktail

name: Lewis' Restaurant & Grille
whatToOrder: Lewis Burger, screwdriver with fresh squeezed OJ

name: The Sand Trap/The Shanty
whatToOrder: Beers average $4 and mixed drinks are $6-$8
